EmbeddedForm.name: Embedded form
EmbeddedForm.description: A form embedded in another form

storeDataInParentForm.name: Store data in parent form
storeDataInParentForm.description: If false, nested form data show as nested object, true otherwise

options.name: Options
options.description: The additional options for loading the embedded form

disabled.name: Disabled
disabled.description: If true, the embedded form is disabled

readOnly.name: Read only
readOnly.description: If true, the embedded form is read-only

Repeater.name: Repeater
Repeater.description: The Repeater component is a special component that is responsible for displaying an array of repeating components

itemRenderWhen.name: Item render when
itemRenderWhen.description: The expression or function to conditionally render a repeater item
